machine learning.sub_title: Get to know our 3D printing department
machine learning.heading: If you can imagine it, we can print it with the highest quality
machine learning.description: Our 3D printing service ranges from prototype creation to final part production, adapting to the specific needs of each client. Whether you need a unique model for a special project or a series of components for your business, at Pulpodin we are prepared to help you achieve your goals.

why choose us.heading: We create personalized designs to your liking
why choose us.technology_text: At Pulpodin, we use state-of-the-art 3D printing technology to bring your ideas to life with precision and speed. Our advanced printers can handle complex designs, ensuring that every detail is captured just as you imagined.
why choose us.customization_text: Imagination is the only limit when it comes to Pulpodin's customization capabilities. Our team of designers works closely with you to create custom 3D models that meet your exact specifications.
why choose us.eco_solutions_text: At Pulpodin, we are committed to sustainability in our 3D printing processes. We use eco-friendly materials and adopt practices that minimize waste without compromising quality.

contact us.heading: We print your ideas in 3D with precision and quality

gallery.title: Discover our gallery
gallery.description: We specialize in creating unique solutions through 3D printing, offering a wide range of custom prints that span from industrial prototypes to decorative objects. Our gallery showcases the versatility and precision of our prints, highlighting product engineering, custom design, and innovative applications across various sectors. Explore our collection and discover how we turn ideas into three-dimensional reality.

testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
testimonials.testimonial1_text: “I am absolutely delighted with Pulpodin's 3D printing service. From the first contact, the team was incredibly professional and attentive to my needs.”
testimonials.testimonial2_text: Pulpodin's 3D printing service has been exceptional. The quality of the products and attention to detail exceeded our expectations. Thanks to their team, we have been able to innovate and improve our internal processes. Highly recommended!

We analyze and present success stories that offer your clients, partners, and visitors a deep understanding of the latest technological trends. Our comprehensive approach and expert advice ensure that your audience gets the maximum benefit, keeping them always interested and engaged.

sub-title.innovacion-estrategia: INNOVATION AND STRATEGY AT YOUR SERVICE

heading3.marketing-digital: Personalized digital marketing for exceptional results

description.pulpodin-description: At Pulpodin, we understand that every company is unique. That's why our Digital Marketing Department is dedicated to designing tailored strategies that not only position your brand in the market but also create genuine connections with your audience. We specialize in transforming your digital presence, optimizing every aspect to ensure you achieve results that exceed your expectations. With an integrated and personalized approach, we help you stand out in today's competitive digital environment and achieve the success your business deserves.

heading4.marketing-exito: Digital marketing tailored for the success of your company

social-text.descripcion-redes: We manage your social media, creating content and fostering an active community. We adjust strategies to maximize impact.

social-text-2.descripcion-asesoria: We guide you to optimize your social media strategy, improving your presence with effective practices.

ads-text.descripcion-campanas: We create optimized advertising campaigns on Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and Instagram Ads to maximize your return on investment.

content-strategy-text.descripcion-contenido: We design content based on audience analysis to attract and convert potential clients.

seo-text.descripcion-seo: We position your site on search engines through SEO and SEM campaigns, attracting more potential clients.

email-text.descripcion-email: We develop email marketing campaigns to maintain relationships with your clients and foster their loyalty.

package-text-1.descripcion-pulpillo: This package is ideal for small businesses that are just starting to manage their social media or looking to maintain a constant and basic online presence. Optimizing the Biography and regular posts help keep the profile active and attractive to followers.

package-text-2.descripcion-pulpo: This package is suitable for medium-sized businesses looking for greater interaction with their audience and more frequent content. Additional visits for content creation allow for a more dynamic and authentic presence.

package-text-3.descripcion-pulpon: This package is designed for large companies or brands that want a strong presence on social media. The high frequency of posts and visits for content creation ensures that the profile is constantly updated with fresh and attractive content, and provides personalized attention to followers.

cta-final.cta-text: Start today with a plan designed for your business's success.

project-description-1.lanzamiento-descripcion: We managed the digital launch of a new product for TechSolutions, online advertising campaigns, and content marketing strategies. The goal was to generate anticipation and capture potential clients.

project-description-2.seo-descripcion: We implemented an SEO optimization strategy for EcoFriendly, improving their search engine ranking. We conducted a full website audit, keyword optimization, and relevant content creation to increase organic traffic.

project-description-3.email-marketing-descripcion: We designed and executed an email marketing campaign for HealthFirst, focused on nurturing leads and converting subscribers into clients. We used advanced segmentation and personalized content to maximize the open and conversion rates.

project-description-4.estrategia-redes-descripcion: We developed a comprehensive social media strategy for InnovateCorp, including creating engaging content and managing profiles. The goal was to increase brand visibility and interaction with their audience.

cta-link2.atrevete: dare to take the first step!

post-excerpt-1.descripcion-automatizacion: Marketing automation is one of the most powerful tools in current digital marketing. It uses software to automate repetitive tasks such as sending emails, scheduling social media posts, and managing advertising campaigns. Tools like HubSpot, Marketo, and ActiveCampaign allow companies to personalize communication with customers on a large scale, improve operational efficiency, and increase conversion rates. With automation, marketing teams can focus on more creative strategies and data-driven decision making.

post-excerpt-2.descripcion-marketing-datos: Data-driven marketing is a crucial trend in today's digital landscape, where information is key to success. This approach uses large volumes of data (Big Data) and advanced analytics to make informed and precise decisions in marketing strategies. Tools like Google Analytics, Tableau, and Power BI facilitate the collection, analysis, and visualization of customer data, enabling companies to optimize campaigns, segment audiences, and maximize return on investment (ROI). Data-driven marketing helps to better understand customers and tailor strategies to meet their specific needs.

post-title-3.realidad-aumentada: Augmented Reality (AR) and Virtual Reality (VR) in Marketing

post-excerpt-3.descripcion-realidad-aumentada: Augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) are transforming the way brands interact with their consumers, offering immersive experiences that capture attention and generate engagement. These technologies allow users to experience products or services in a virtual environment before making a purchase decision. For example, IKEA uses AR to enable customers to visualize how furniture would look in their homes, while fashion brands use VR to offer virtual fashion shows.

cta-heading2.transforma-negocio: Transform your business with our digital strategies

sublimation-info-heading.descripcion-sublimado: We offer comprehensive sublimation services that bring your ideas to life and strengthen your brand identity with vibrant and durable designs.

sub-title3.conoce-sublimado: Get to know our sublimation department

description2.descripcion-servicio: Our sublimation service covers everything from creating custom designs to producing unique pieces, adapting to the specific needs of each client. Whether you need a special item for an event or a series of personalized products for your business, at Pulpodin we are ready to help you materialize your ideas with the highest quality and detail.

project-text-1.maketicket-description: This website aims to provide a platform that allows ticket sales, event bookings, and national invitation sends. It also allows managing access control for the entire event.

project-text-2.ebango-description: It is a platform that allows investing in multiple currencies and precious metals, generating profits through small percentages. Additionally, users can earn commissions by referring new clients who invest in the platform.

project-text-3.ewexcar-description: At Ewexcar, we offer a wide selection of vehicles with credit financing plans designed to suit your needs. Our special plans make acquiring the car of your dreams more accessible and convenient.

section-under-heading2.final-heading: At Pulpodin, we turn challenges into innovative solutions.

technology.descripcion: At Pulpodin, we are dedicated to offering reliable and effective software solutions, backed by our extensive experience in the most advanced technologies. We specialize in developing solutions that are tailored to the specific needs of each client, ensuring results that help optimize and enhance their operations. Pulpodin is the ideal partner for software outsourcing, providing services that generate value and efficiency.

heading2.tendencias-tecnologicas: Technological trends transforming the software sector

post-excerpt.descripcion-ia: Artificial intelligence is no longer a novelty; it has become an essential component in software development. From automation to predictive analytics, AI is optimizing processes and creating new opportunities to personalize the user experience. At Pulpodin, we are incorporating AI into our solutions to offer faster performance and more informed decisions.

post-excerpt2.descripcion-nube: Cloud native development is becoming the preferred option for many companies due to its scalability and efficiency. It allows applications to run more efficiently and adapt quickly to changes in demand. At Pulpodin, we are implementing cloud native solutions to ensure our clients can scale their operations seamlessly.

post-title-4.aumento-uso: Increase in the Use of Low-Code/No-Code Platforms

post-excerpt-4.descripcion-uso: Low-code and no-code development platforms are democratizing the software creation process, allowing individuals without technical knowledge to develop functional applications. Our team at Pulpodin is already using these tools to streamline the delivery of solutions without compromising quality.

cta-heading.cta-text: We offer a full range of IT services to ensure your success.

mision.title: Our Mission
mision.text: At Pulpodin, our mission is to ignite the spark that lights up your brand through comprehensive solutions in digital marketing, graphic design, and 3D technology. We are dedicated to transforming ideas into unforgettable digital experiences that resonate globally. We are passionate about providing superior customer service, always at the forefront of innovation, to offer unique and creative solutions. We believe in designing visual identities that not only capture the eye but also forge deep connections with your audience, driving sustainable and lasting growth. With Pulpodin, your vision transforms into reality in an authentic, vibrant, and memorable way.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: At Pulpodin, our vision is to lead digital innovation and creativity, being recognized for driving brand growth through cutting-edge technological solutions and genuine strategies. We aim to stand out as a sector benchmark, adapting to the changing needs of the digital environment with a personalized, results-oriented approach. We want to be the preferred strategic partner for companies looking to excel and establish authentic connections with their audience in a constantly evolving digital world. We are committed to always staying at the forefront, offering creative and technological solutions that ensure the relevance and sustained success of our clients. In summary, our vision is to inspire and connect, taking brands beyond the imaginable.

valores.title: Our Values
valores.text: At Pulpodin, creativity is the essence that guides each of our projects. We foster innovation and originality, always seeking unique and personalized solutions for each client. Our commitment to excellence drives us to work closely with our clients, exceeding their expectations at every stage of the process. We value authenticity, building strong and reliable relationships based on honesty and transparency. Growth is another of our fundamental values. We focus on the continuous development of both our team and our clients and their brands. We stand out for offering personalized and superior quality customer service, ensuring that each client feels cared for and supported at all times. Technological innovation is key for us; we stay at the forefront of digital and 3D tools, providing modern and effective solutions that drive success in the competitive world of digital marketing. In summary, at Pulpodin, our passion for creativity, commitment to excellence, continuous growth, and technological innovation drives us to transform our clients' vision into a vibrant and successful reality.

section three.title: Marketing Consultant
section three.text: We offer marketing consultancy that generates personalized strategies to improve your business's visibility and performance. Our experience and innovative techniques ensure optimal results.
section three.text2: We provide technology consultancy to implement solutions that optimize your processes and increase operational efficiency. With our professional approach and advanced resources, we take your company to the next level.

section final.text1: Discover the path to digital success with Pulpodin, your innovative software development and marketing startup.

graphic_design.title: Graphic Design
graphic_design.description: We offer graphic design services that create effective visual solutions to enhance your business success.
graphic_design.corporate_identity_description: Creation of logos, color palettes, and brand manuals that reflect the essence and values of your company, ensuring a consistent and professional image.
graphic_design.advertising_materials_description: Development of brochures, posters, banners, and other promotional materials that grab attention and effectively communicate your message.
graphic_design.packaging_description: Design of attractive and functional packaging that stands out in the market and reinforces your brand identity.

graphic_section.title: Our graphic design team is dedicated to turning your ideas into stunning visual creations.
graphic_section.description: From corporate identity to social media design, we are here to help you stand out and communicate your message effectively and attractively.

work_process.subtitle: How we work
work_process.title: Our business model is based on 4 key steps

work_process_step_1.title: 01. Initial Meeting and Briefing:
work_process_step_1.description: We start with a meeting to understand your needs, goals, and vision. We gather all the necessary information to ensure the design accurately reflects your brand and message.

work_process_step_2.title: 02. Research and Conceptualization:
work_process_step_2.description: We conduct thorough research on your industry, competitors, and current trends. Based on this information, we develop creative concepts that align with your objectives.

work_process_step_3.title: 03. Design and Review:
work_process_step_3.description: We create the initial designs and share them with you for feedback. We make necessary revisions to ensure the final result meets your expectations and requirements.

work_process_step_4.title: 04. Delivery and Support:
work_process_step_4.description: Once the final design is approved, we deliver all the necessary files in the appropriate formats. Additionally, we offer ongoing support for any future adjustments or updates you may need.

cta.title: Transform your brand with impactful designs. Discover the power of graphic design with Pulpodin and take your business to the next level!
cta.highlight: Transform your brand with impactful designs.

projects.title: Design Projects
projects.subtitle: We are proud to have delivered high-quality graphic design projects
projects.experience-description: At Pulpodin, we have extensive experience in carrying out graphic design projects for various industries. Our team has worked with clients of all sizes, from startups to large corporations, creating visual solutions that stand out and effectively communicate their messages. We take pride in our ability to understand each client's unique needs and transform their ideas into impactful and memorable designs. With a focus on creativity, quality, and attention to detail, Pulpodin is your ideal partner to take your brand to the next level.

projects2.title: Completed Projects
projects2.subtitle: Take a look at our projects
projects2.project1-description: We redesigned the visual identity of TechSolutions, including a new logo, color palette, and marketing materials. The goal was to modernize the company's image and reflect its innovation and leadership in the tech sector.

contact2.title: Need more information?
contact2.description: We are here to help! Feel free to contact us through our social channels. We will respond within a few hours and guarantee a reply within 2 business days.
contact2.address: Calle Berrizbeitia with Avenida Jose Antonio Paez, El Paraiso (Caracas, Venezuela)

packages.description_pulpillo: This package is ideal for small businesses that are just starting to manage their social media or looking to maintain a constant and basic online presence. Biography optimization and regular posts help keep the profile active and attractive to followers. Included services: • Biography optimization. • Content planning and Copywriting. • 10 posts or reels per month (2 posts or reels per week). • 20 stories per month (1 story from Monday to Saturday). • Graphic design and account management. • Basic monthly report. • One monthly visit for content creation. Investment: from $150 to $300 USD per month.
packages.description_pulpo: This package is suitable for medium-sized businesses looking for greater audience engagement and more frequent content. Additional visits for content creation enable a more dynamic and authentic presence. Included services: • Profile optimization. • Content planning and Copywriting. • 15 posts or reels per month (3 posts or reels per week). • 45 stories per month (1 to 2 stories inter daily). • Graphic design and account management. • Monthly report. • Two monthly visits for content creation. • User interaction. • ADS management (paid advertising). • Marketing strategy. Investment: from $300 to $500 USD per month.
packages.description_pulpon: This package is designed for large companies or brands that want a strong presence on social media. The high frequency of posts and visits for content creation ensures that the profile is constantly updated with fresh and engaging content while also providing personalized attention to followers. Included services: • Profile optimization. • Content planning and Copywriting. • 30 posts or reels per month (6 posts or reels per week). • 90 stories per month (3 stories daily). • Graphic design and account management. • Monthly report. • 1 weekly visit for content creation. • Customer service. • User interaction. • ADS management (paid advertising). • Marketing strategy. Investment: from $600 to $900 USD per month.

sublimation_services.heading: Details included when hiring our sublimation services:
sublimation_services.advisor: Personalized advice to understand your needs and recommend the best sublimation solutions.
sublimation_services.design: Custom graphic design, creating images and patterns according to your specifications.
sublimation_services.high_quality_printing: High-quality sublimation using durable inks and materials to ensure exceptional results.
sublimation_services.optimization: Design optimization to ensure precise and vibrant transfer.
sublimation_services.prototypes: Quick prototypes to validate your ideas and conduct tests before final production.
sublimation_services.mass_production: Mass production of sublimated products for large-scale projects.
sublimation_services.revision: Review and adjustment of products to ensure they meet your expectations and quality standards.
sublimation_services.support: Ongoing technical support to resolve any issues or questions during the process.
sublimation_services.delivery: Timely delivery of your sublimated products, ensuring you receive them within the agreed timeframe.

machine learningav.heading22: Details included when hiring our audiovisual production services:
machine learningav.item_1: Personalized advice to understand your needs and recommend the best audiovisual solutions.
machine learningav.item_2: Pre-production, including script, storyboarding, and planning.
machine learningav.item_3: Video production with high-quality equipment and trained professionals.
machine learningav.item_4: Post-production, including editing, visual effects, and sound.
machine learningav.item_5: Animation and motion graphics to enhance the visual quality of your projects.
machine learningav.item_6: Content optimization for various platforms and devices.
machine learningav.item_7: Review and adjustment of the final product, ensuring it meets your expectations and quality standards.
machine learningav.item_8: Continuous technical support to resolve any problems or doubts during the process.
machine learningav.item_9: On-time delivery of your audiovisual projects, ensuring you receive them on schedule.

budgets.heading: Audiovisual Services
budgets.content_1: 1. Audiovisual Content Creation Budget: This budget includes the complete production of Instagram videos, from planning to final delivery.

included_services.concept_script: Concept and Script: Development of the idea, script, and storyboard. (Estimated cost: 30−50 USD per video).
included_services.pre_production: Pre-production: Location planning, wardrobe, schedules, and resources. (Estimated cost: 20−40 USD per video).
included_services.recording: Recording: Filming with professional equipment (camera, lighting, sound). (Estimated cost: 50−100 USD per video).
included_services.editing_post_production: Editing and Post-production: Assembly, effects, transitions, music, and subtitles. (Estimated cost: 40−80 USD per video).
included_services.graphic_design: Graphic Design (Optional): Creation of animated graphics, texts, and overlays. (20−50 USD per video).

titulo.heading: What is it?
titulo.descripcion: POP Material refers to visual, decorative, or informative elements placed in strategic locations within a store or point of sale. Its goal is to grab the consumer's attention and promote impulse purchases, providing an interactive and memorable experience. POP materials can be both functional and aesthetic, designed to facilitate the sale of a product or service.

cta22.mensaje: We offer a full range of IT services to ensure your success

projects22.title: Take a look at
projects22.description_1: We redesigned TechSolutions' visual identity, including a new logo, color palette, and marketing materials. The goal was to modernize the company's image and reflect its innovation and leadership in the tech sector.

graphic-design.title: Logo Design
graphic-design.description: At Pulpodin, our graphic design team specializes in creating logos that reflect your brand's essence and project it strongly in the market. Every detail is carefully crafted to ensure your visual identity stands out and connects with your audience.

basic-package.name: Basic Package: Simple Logo
basic-package.revisions: Revisions: 1 round of revisions for minor adjustments.
basic-package.format: Format: Delivery in PNG and JPG format (transparent background and with background).
basic-package.mockup: Basic application: Logo preview in a social media mockup (e.g., how it would look on an Instagram profile).
basic-package.palette: Color Palette: 1 suggested color palette for the logo.

intermediate-package.name: Intermediate Package: Professional Logo
intermediate-package.revisions: Revisions: 2 rounds of revisions for adjustments.
intermediate-package.format: Format: Delivery in PNG, JPG, SVG, and PDF formats (editable vectors).
intermediate-package.mockup: Application: Logo preview in mockups for social media, business cards, and stationery.
intermediate-package.palette: Color Palette: 1 color palette + typography suggestions.
intermediate-package.guide: Basic Guide: Brief explanation on how to use the logo (minimum sizes, allowed colors, etc.).

premium-package.name: Premium Package: Logo + Complete Branding
premium-package.revisions: Revisions: 3 rounds of revisions for adjustments.
premium-package.format: Format: Delivery in PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, and AI (editable files in Illustrator).
premium-package.mockup: Application: Logo preview in mockups for social media, business cards, stationery, uniforms, and vehicles.
premium-package.palette: Color Palette: 1 color palette + typography + suggested iconography.
premium-package.guide: Complete Guide: Basic brand manual with logo usage guidelines (colors, sizes, spaces, etc.).

important-notes.pricing-adjustment: These prices may vary depending on the complexity of the project and the client's specific needs.
important-notes.custom-packages: Request your custom packages when combining multiple services.
important-notes.contact-us: Contact us today to boost your brand!

graphic-design-social.title: Social Media Design
graphic-design-social.description: At Pulpodin, our graphic design team specializes in creating social media content that reflects your brand's essence on every platform. Every detail is carefully crafted to ensure a coherent and attractive visual identity that connects with your audience.

basic-post-package.name: Basic Package: Simple Post Design
basic-post-package.design: Design: 1 post design for Instagram or Facebook (standard size).
basic-post-package.revisions: Revisions: 1 round of revisions for minor adjustments.
basic-post-package.format: Format: Delivery in PNG and JPG.
basic-post-package.extras: Extras: Use of predefined templates (not customized).

intermediate-post-package.name: Intermediate Package: Professional Post Design
intermediate-post-package.design: Design: 1 post design for Instagram, Facebook, or LinkedIn (standard size).
intermediate-post-package.revisions: Revisions: 2 rounds of revisions for adjustments.
intermediate-post-package.format: Format: Delivery in PNG, JPG, and PDF.
intermediate-post-package.mockups: Mockups: Post preview in a social media mockup.

premium-post-package.name: Premium Package: Post Design + Visual Strategy
premium-post-package.design: Design: 1 post design for Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, or TikTok (standard size).
premium-post-package.revisions: Revisions: 3 rounds of revisions for adjustments.
premium-post-package.format: Format: Delivery in PNG, JPG, PDF, and editable files (PSD or AI).
premium-post-package.extras: Extras: Customized design + adaptation to different formats (stories, reels, etc.).
premium-post-package.mockups: Mockups: Post preview in different mockups (profile, stories, etc.).
premium-post-package.guide: Basic Guide: Suggestions for colors and fonts to maintain visual consistency.

important-notes-post.pricing-adjustment: These prices may vary depending on the complexity of the project and the client's specific needs.
important-notes-post.custom-packages: Request your custom packages when combining multiple services.
important-notes-post.contact-us: Contact us today to boost your brand!

graphic-design-flyers.title: Flyer or Brochure Design
graphic-design-flyers.description: At Pulpodin, our graphic design team specializes in creating flyers and brochures that convey your brand's essence and attract your audience. Every detail is meticulously crafted to ensure a coherent and memorable visual identity that highlights your messages and connects with your audience.

basic-flyer-package.name: Basic Package: Simple Flyer
basic-flyer-package.revisions: Revisions: 1 round of revisions for minor adjustments.
basic-flyer-package.format: Format: Delivery in PDF (print-ready) and JPG.
basic-flyer-package.extras: Extras: Use of predefined templates (not customized).

intermediate-flyer-package.name: Intermediate Package: Professional Flyer
intermediate-flyer-package.revisions: Revisions: 2 rounds of revisions for adjustments.
intermediate-flyer-package.format: Format: Delivery in PDF (high resolution) and editable files (AI or PSD).
intermediate-flyer-package.mockups: Mockups: Flyer preview in a mockup (e.g., how it would look in hand).

premium-flyer-package.name: Premium Package: Flyer + Adaptations
premium-flyer-package.revisions: Revisions: 3 rounds of revisions for adjustments.
premium-flyer-package.format: Format: Delivery in PDF (high resolution) and editable files (AI or PSD).
premium-flyer-package.extras: Extras: Customized design + adaptation to different formats (A4, A5, digital, etc.).
premium-flyer-package.mockups: Mockups: Flyer preview in different mockups (hand, wall, etc.).
premium-flyer-package.guide: Basic Guide: Suggestions for colors and typography for future designs.

important-notes-flyers.custom-packages: Request your custom packages when combining multiple services.
important-notes-flyers.contact-us: Contact us today to boost your brand!

graphic-design-billboards.title: Billboard Design
graphic-design-billboards.description: At Pulpodin, our graphic design team specializes in creating billboards that strongly convey your brand's essence. Every detail is carefully crafted to generate a visually appealing and memorable impact, connecting with your audience and highlighting your messages.

basic-package-design-body.format: Format: Delivered in PDF (high resolution) and JPG.

intermediate-package-design-body.format: Format: Delivered in PDF (high resolution) and editable files (AI or PSD).
intermediate-package-design-body.mockups: Mockups: Billboard visualization in a mockup (e.g., how it would appear on the street).

premium-package-design-body.format: Format: Delivered in PDF (high resolution) and editable files (AI or PSD).
premium-package-design-body.extras: Extras: Custom design + adaptation to various formats (digital billboard, spectacular, etc.).
premium-package-design-body.mockups: Mockups: Visualization of the billboard in different mockups (street, digital, etc.).

graphic-design-services-section.heading: Catalog Design
graphic-design-services-section.description: At Pulpodin, our graphic design team specializes in creating catalogs that reinforce your brand's essence. Every detail is carefully crafted to deliver an attractive and coherent visual experience, highlighting your products or services and effectively connecting with your audience.

basic-package-catalog-body.design: Design: Catalog design with up to 10 pages.
basic-package-catalog-body.format: Format: Delivered in PDF (print-ready) and JPG.

intermediate-package-catalog-body.design: Design: Catalog design with up to 20 pages.
intermediate-package-catalog-body.format: Format: Delivered in PDF (high resolution) and editable files (AI or PSD).
intermediate-package-catalog-body.mockups: Mockups: Visualization of the catalog in a mockup (e.g., how it would look in hand).

premium-package-catalog-body.design: Design: Catalog design with up to 30 pages.
premium-package-catalog-body.format: Format: Delivered in PDF (high resolution) and editable files (AI or PSD).
premium-package-catalog-body.extras: Extras: Custom design + adaptation to various formats (digital, print, etc.).
premium-package-catalog-body.mockups: Mockups: Visualization of the catalog in different mockups (hand, table, etc.).
premium-package-catalog-body.guide: Basic guide: Suggestions for colors and fonts for future designs.

web-design-services-section.heading: Web Design
web-design-services-section.description: We design functional, attractive, and optimized websites to enhance your brand, improve user experience, and boost your digital presence. From corporate pages to online stores, we create tailor-made solutions that combine creativity, usability, and technology.

basic-package-web-body.description: Description: Ideal for entrepreneurs who need a basic website to showcase their business.
basic-package-web-body.basic-web-design: Basic web design: Up to 5 sections (home, about us, services, blog, contact).
basic-package-web-body.instagram-designs: Instagram posts design: 5 designs to promote the website launch.

intermediate-package-web-body.description: Description: Perfect for businesses needing a more advanced website with additional functionalities.
intermediate-package-web-body.advanced-web-design: Advanced web design: Up to 10 sections (custom integrations, forms, etc.).
intermediate-package-web-body.brand-manual: Brand manual: Creation of a basic brand manual.
intermediate-package-web-body.instagram-designs: Instagram posts design: 10 designs to promote the website.

full-package-web-body.description: Description: The complete solution for companies looking for a premium website with custom design and advanced functionalities.
full-package-web-body.premium-web-design: Premium web design: Up to 15 sections (e-commerce, advanced integrations, responsive design).
full-package-web-body.brand-manual: Brand manual: Creation of a complete brand manual.
full-package-web-body.visual-identity: Visual identity: Application of the identity across different media.
full-package-web-body.instagram-designs: Instagram posts design: 20 designs to promote the website.
